RECURRENCEPATTERN.TITLE: RRule
RECURRENCEPATTERN.DESC: Can also be compiled on https://icalendar.org/rrule-tool.html.

FREQ.TITLE: Frequency
FREQ.DESC: The frequency at which this schedule should run. Can be further customized once this field is defined.

INTERVAL.TITLE: Interval
INTERVAL.DESC: The interval at which this schedule should run. E.g. if 'Daily' is chosen in frequency, then this field can be used to select every 2nd/3rd day.

BYDAY.TITLE: Days
BYDAY.DESC: Select the weekdays that the schedule should run, if only certain days are required.

STARTDATE.TITLE: Start Date
STARTDATE.DESC: The date on which this schedule should start.

BYMONTH.TITLE: Month
BYMONTH.DESC: Select the month(s) that the schedule should run, if only certain month(s) are required.

OCCURRENCE.TITLE: Occurrence
OCCURRENCE.DESC: Until when should this schedule configuration be active.

UNTIL.TITLE: Until
UNTIL.DESC: The date until when this schedule should run.

NR.TITLE: Number
NR.DESC: The amount of times this schedule should run.
